attorneys: Edward C. Crow, Attorney-General, and Sam B. Jeffries, Assistant Attorney-General, for the State.
headnotes: Appeals: criminal law: no bill-os’ exceptions. When no bill of exceptions is filed and no error appears in the record proper, the judgment will be affirmed on appeal.
summary: Appeal from St. Loids City Circuit Court. — Hon. William Zachritz, Judge.

opinions.opinion_text:
Sherwood, J.
— Grand larceny the charge, a milch cow the subject-matter of the theft, and sentence for three years in the penitentiary, are the component parts of this record in which, as there is no error and no bill of exceptions, judgment affirmed.
All concur.
